content: a total of 16 times 32 row in total using needle three *ktbl twice p2* repeat until you have 14 15 16 18 sts on needle three heel turn using needle four *ktbl twice p2* repeat until you have 14 15 16 18 sts on continuing on the one needle used for the heel flap needle four row 1 rs s1 k16 17 18 20 ssk k1 turn using needle five *ktbl twice p2* repeat until you have 14 15 16 18 sts on row 2 ws s1 p7 p2tog p1 turn needle five row 3 rs s1 k to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn row 4 ws s1 p to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn here you will notice the first needle you used to cast on your stitches now has no stitches on there this means you will use this needle to knit the next lot of repeat row 3 and 4 until you have 16 18 20 22 sts stitches onto it this will leave you with one working needle at all times if making the small size 60 st you will need to omit the k1 and p1 at the end of join sts in the round continuing the *ktbl twice p2* for 5 more rounds row 3 and 4 on the last two row this will mean you need to turn the work after note change to your main colour here the ssk and the p2tog leg note here is where you need to change your yarn back to the main colour if you had a contrast heel also remember those stitch markers and progress keeper k for five rounds you ll need them on the next section note if you are wanting a contrast heel change yarn here heel flap @ blue fern yarns my shorty socks ©shannon long february 2021 3 foot decreases foot from here you will be working in rounds again k in the round - 58 60 64 72 you should have finished on a wrong side purl row turn your work and k across work until the foot measures 1 5 1 75 2 inches less than the length of the foot all sts 16 18 20 22 note keep the stitch markers in place as these will help for completing the toe with the main colour knit across all sts just slip them as you go with one of the unused needles pick up 16 sts along the heel flap and 1 on the toe main colour 17 sts in total add marker k across to other side add second note if you want a contrast toe change the colour here marker and pick up 17 sts one from the main colour and the other 16 from the heel flap k one round you should have 78 82 86 92 sts across four needles set up row k to marker either side is fine i also move the progress keeper here to remind me
